tasks.name: Daily HAPPY Emotion Task
tasks.description: Capture a photo expressing happy emotion and answer the questionnaire.

questions.title: Is there a clear human face?
questions.description: Please check if there is a clear human face in the photo

questions.title: Please select the type of emotion?
questions.description: Choose the emotion type that best matches the photo

questions.title: How strong do you think the emotion in this photo is?
questions.description: Rate the emotional intensity from lowest to highest

questions.title: How natural do you think this photo is?
questions.description: Evaluate the naturalness of the photo

questions.title: How would you rate your emotional continuity?
questions.description: Rate your emotional continuity from calmness to exciting
